title: Is the Carolina Beach Fishing Pier still on hold, or is it a dead issue?
text:
We're not sure which pier you're referring to, as none are called
by that name, but if it regards the Snow's Cut facility, here's your
answer:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090805/ARTICLES/908059984



The only other pier being considered on Pleasure Island is one at the
aquarium at Fort Fisher, and those plans are still just that -- plans.
